name: Jin Nakamura
description: Lieutenant of the Neon Dragons, a tech-gang that controls the Shibuya Market district. Known for his mirror-chrome cyberarms and ruthless efficiency. Never fights fair.

weapons.name: Tsunami Arms Helix
weapons.notes: Smart pistol, +2 to hit with targeting link

abilities.name: Chrome Rush
abilities.description: Once per combat, can take two actions in a single turn. Sandevistan-style burst of speed.

abilities.name: Threat Assessment
abilities.description: Can identify the most dangerous target in a group. Always attacks the biggest threat first.

abilities.name: Street Rep
abilities.description: NPCs in Shibuya Market recognize Jin. +2 to Intimidation checks in his territory.

behavior.tactics: Opens with Chrome Rush to eliminate the biggest threat. Uses cover and flanking. Will retreat if outgunned but never forgets a face.
behavior.morale: Fights to 25% HP, then attempts tactical withdrawal. Will surrender only if completely cornered and offered terms.
behavior.motivation: Protecting Neon Dragons territory. Proving himself to the gang's boss. Secretly wants out but sees no path.

notes:
Jin grew up in the same orphanage as the gang's current boss. Loyalty runs deep, but he's starting to question the direction things are going. Could potentially be flipped with the right leverageâ€”or the right offer.

Recognizable by the dragon tattoo that wraps from his neck to his chrome shoulder.
